item.title: Neurogrid CTF: Human-Only 2025 | Pwn
item.description: Neurogrid CTF: Human-Only 2025 was a 4-day CTF hosted by HackTheBox. I competed solo as “Legendary Queue” and finished in the top 4 out of 1337 players. This post covers the Pwn challenges.
